Config.Resource: SELECT COUNT(DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.LINK_ID) LINK_ID,SUM(INVESTMENT_TOTAL) INVESTMENT_TOTAL,SUM(REDEMPTION_TOTAL) REDEMPTION_TOTAL, SUM(NETINVESTMENT) NETINVESTMENT FROM DT_FIN_CUSTOMER,DT_FIN_MEMBER WHERE DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`OUID`=DT_FIN_MEMBER.`OUID` AND MARKETER_ID={marketerid} AND (DT_FIN_MEMBER.`LABEL` LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR DT_FIN_MEMBER.`PHONE` LIKE '%{keyword}%')
